dcterms:creator: Randall Munroe
dcterms:description: A dataset containing color survey results from over 3.4 million observations collected from more than 222,500 respondents, providing insights into how different colors are perceived and named.
dcterms:title: Munroe dataset

dcterms:creator: Randall Munroe
dcterms:description: The XKCD color survey is a dataset derived from the Munroe dataset, specifically focusing on the color naming and perception results gathered from a large number of respondents.
dcterms:title: XKCD color survey

dcterms:description: A derived dataset from the Munroe dataset, specifically designed to evaluate the model's ability to predict distributions for color names that were not present in the training data.
dcterms:title: Extrapolation sub-dataset

dcterms:description: A derived dataset from the Munroe dataset used for model development, focusing on the training and evaluation of the color distribution estimation model.
dcterms:title: Development dataset

dcterms:description: A derived dataset from the Munroe dataset specifically used for training the model to estimate color distributions based on textual descriptions.
dcterms:title: Training dataset
